segments.text: I'm observing the two children near the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It seems they're up to some mischief, trying to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a wobbly-looking two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching to reach into that 'COOKIE JAR.'
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the plate in his other hand, ready to catch the loot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there with him, eagerly anticipating her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her hand is raised, palm open, a silent plea for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole secret operation is quite amusing to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their task, just like the woman.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope that stool doesn't tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That would be a truly disastrous end to their little adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's funny how coordinated they are without saying a word.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They must be masters of stealthy snack acquisition.
segments.speaker: PAR
